3.0.0.en: Updated to SDK3 (requires Homey version 5.x). Added support for SPI Addressable Controller including an action card to set one of the 300 pre-configured effects.

3.0.1.en: Updated to SDK3 (requires Homey version 5.x). Added support for SPI Addressable Controller including an action card to set one of the 300 pre-configured effects.

3.0.2.en: Updated to SDK3 (requires Homey version 5.x). Added support for SPI Addressable Controller including an action card to set one of the 300 pre-configured effects.

3.0.3.en: Updated to SDK3 (requires Homey version 5.x). Added support for SPI Addressable Controller including an action card to set one of the 300 pre-configured effects.

3.0.4.en: Fixed issue with missing light mode capability and added extra logic as a possible workaround for an issue in the magic-home library resulting in multiple devices being added upon pairing.

3.1.1.en: OPT: add ip address to device settings

3.1.2.en: OPT: change ip when settings are changed

3.2.0.en: NEW: add Capability filter - FIX: white color selector not jumping back anymore

3.2.2.en: FIX: check if hasCapability before registering CapabilityListener
